alert.note: Alert for Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 5:15PM MST until December 06 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulation less than 1 inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern High Plains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow may significantly reduce visibility and cause partial lane blockages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow through this evening will likely stay confined to the US Highway 89 corridor south of US Highway 2.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
